mapper.select: SELECT dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, dt.tmp_name tmpName, e.emp_name empName, dd.title title, dd.doc_approver_state_no approverStateNo, dd.mid_approver_no midApproverNo, dd.mid_approval_state midApprovalState, dd.mid_approval_datetime midApprovalDatetime, dd.final_approver_no finalApproverNo, dd.final_approval_state finalApprovalState, dd.final_approval_datetime finalApprovalDatetime, dd.create_datetime createDatetime, dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo FROM draft_doc dd INNER JOIN doc_tmp dt ON dd.tmp_no = dt.tmp_no INNER JOIN emp e ON dd.drafter_emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE mid_approver_no = #{empNo} OR final_approver_no = #{empNo} AND mid_approval_state = 1 ORDER BY dd.create_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, dt.tmp_name tmpName, e.emp_name empName, dd.title title, dd.doc_approver_state_no approverStateNo, dd.mid_approver_no midApproverNo, dd.mid_approval_state midApprovalState, dd.mid_approval_datetime midApprovalDatetime, dd.final_approver_no finalApproverNo, dd.final_approval_state finalApprovalState, dd.final_approval_datetime finalApprovalDatetime, dd.create_datetime createDatetime, dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo FROM draft_doc dd INNER JOIN doc_tmp dt ON dd.tmp_no = dt.tmp_no INNER JOIN emp e ON dd.drafter_emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE (mid_approver_no = #{empNo} AND mid_approval_state = 0) OR (final_approver_no = #{empNo} AND mid_approval_state = 1 AND final_approval_state = 0) ORDER BY dd.create_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT dt.tmp_name tmpName, e.emp_name empName, dd.title title, dd.doc_approver_state_no approverStateNo, dd.mid_approver_no midApproverNo, dd.mid_approval_state midApprovalState, dd.mid_approval_datetime midApprovalDatetime, dd.final_approver_no finalApproverNo, dd.final_approval_state finalApprovalState, dd.final_approval_datetime finalApprovalDatetime, dd.create_datetime createDatetime, dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo FROM draft_doc dd INNER JOIN doc_tmp dt ON dd.tmp_no = dt.tmp_no INNER JOIN emp e ON dd.drafter_emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE (mid_approver_no = #{empNo} AND mid_approval_state = 1) OR (final_approver_no = #{empNo} AND final_approval_state = 1) ORDER BY dd.create_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM draft_doc WHERE (mid_approver_no = #{empNo} OR final_approver_no = #{empNo})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM draft_doc WHERE (mid_approver_no = #{empNo} AND mid_approval_state = 0) OR (final_approver_no = #{empNo} AND final_approval_state = 0)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM draft_doc WHERE (mid_approver_no = #{empNo} AND mid_approval_state = 1) OR (final_approver_no = #{empNo} AND final_approval_state = 1)

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS zeroState, SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS oneState, SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS twoState, SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS nineState FROM draft_doc dd LEFT JOIN emp e ON dd.drafter_emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN doc_referrer dr ON dd.draft_doc_no = dr.draft_doc_no WHERE (dd.mid_approver_no = #{empNo} OR dd.final_approver_no = #{empNo})

SELECT dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, dd.drafter_emp_no drafterEmpNo, drafter.dpt_no dptNo, drafter.emp_name drafterEmpName, drafterSign.approval_sign_file drafterSign, dd.create_datetime createDatetime, dd.title title, dd.content content, dd.mid_approver_no midApproverNo, midApprover.emp_name midApproverName, midApproverSign.approval_sign_file midApproverSign, dd.mid_approval_state midApprovalState, dd.mid_approval_datetime midApprovalDatetime, dd.final_approver_no finalApproverNo, finalApprover.emp_name finalApproverName, finalApproverSign.approval_sign_file finalApproverSign, dd.final_approval_state finalApprovalState, dd.final_approval_datetime finalApprovalDatetime, dd.mid_approver_reason midApproverReason, dd.final_approver_reason finalApproverReason, dd.doc_approver_state_no docApproverState, dd.tmp_no tmpNo FROM draft_doc dd LEFT JOIN emp drafter ON dd.drafter_emp_no = drafter.emp_no LEFT JOIN approval_sign drafterSign ON drafter.emp_no = drafterSign.emp_no LEFT JOIN emp midApprover ON dd.mid_approver_no = midApprover.emp_no LEFT JOIN approval_sign midApproverSign ON midApprover.emp_no = midApproverSign.emp_no LEFT JOIN emp finalApprover ON dd.final_approver_no = finalApprover.emp_no LEFT JOIN approval_sign finalApproverSign ON finalApprover.emp_no = finalApproverSign.emp_no WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}

SELECT d.draft_doc_order draftDocOrder, d.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, d.start_date startDate, d.end_date endDate, d.type_name typeName, d.amount amount, d.description description, d.text text FROM draft_doc_detail d WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}

SELECT d.draft_doc_order draftDocOrder, d.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, d.start_date startDate, d.end_date endDate, d.type_name typeName, d.amount amount, d.description description, d.text text FROM draft_doc_detail d WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}

SELECT d.draft_doc_file_no draftDocFileNo, d.original_file originalFile, d.save_file saveFile, d.`type` type, d.create_datetime createDatetime, d.update_datetime updateDatetime, d.draft_doc_no draftDocNo FROM draft_doc_file d WHERE d.draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}

SELECT dr.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT(dr.referrer_emp_no, '(', e.emp_name, ')') SEPARATOR ',' ) referrerName FROM doc_referrer dr LEFT JOIN emp e ON dr.referrer_emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE dr.draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo} group BY dr.draft_doc_no

SELECT doh.start_date startDate, doh.end_date endDate, doh.cancle_YN cancleYN, doh.cancle_reason cancleReason, doh.use_year useYear, doh.emergency_contact emergencyContact, doh.type_name typeName FROM day_off_history doh WHERE doh.draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE draft_doc SET mid_approval_state = 1, mid_approval_datetime = NOW(), doc_approver_state_no =1 WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}
UPDATE draft_doc SET final_approval_state = 1, final_approval_datetime = NOW(), doc_approver_state_no =2 WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}
UPDATE draft_doc SET mid_approval_state = 1, mid_approval_datetime = NOW(), doc_approver_state_no = 9, mid_approver_reason = #{rejectionReason} WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}
UPDATE draft_doc SET final_approval_state = 1, final_approval_datetime = NOW(), doc_approver_state_no =9, final_approver_reason = #{rejectionReason} WHERE draft_doc_no = #{draftDocNo}
